Reviews.Title: Beautiful Camera
Reviews.Author: Jorge
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera one year now and have learned to use it very well.The pictures it takes are outstanding and with two other lenses I've purchased since has brought my photography up a notch or two just because of it's sharpness alone. There is no camera other than those by Olympus that have five axis in body image stabilization.People ask me if I am using a tripod and I say no. That speaks for itself right there.The reviews out there are for real.
